content: What famous English rock band, formed in Liverpool in 1960, consisted of members John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr?

The famous English rock band you're referring to is The Beatles. Formed in Liverpool in 1960, the band consisted of John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr. They are widely regarded as one of the most influential and successful bands in the history of music.
